question.body: Tori mentions that the skin protects us from microbes, how do you think it accomplishes this?

multiple_choice.choice: The skin is a covering that keeps things out of our body.
The skin secretes chemicals such as sweat and oils that form an antiseptic layer.
The skin protects us from dehydration and drying out.
All of the above are ways the skin protects us.

response.feedback: Incorrect. While this is true, there are additional methods the skin uses to protect us.
Incorrect. While this is true, there are additional methods the skin uses to protect us.

Correct. As you can see, the skin has several methods of protecting the body.

part.hint: The skin is a very complex organ that is critical for protection and for survival.
